name: Time Assassin (itch)
description:
This game was made for the "a jam about time" game jam.

Credit to:

briefjoe - game design, programming. sprites, sound effects

non123p - game design, programming. sprites, sound effects

AlphaShire - music

Due to time restraints, a lot of content was cut; we plan to add it in the future.

We plan to add:

-Boss Battles

-Switching between the past and the present during levels

-Chapter 4
